definition: to carry/to convey/to load/to hold/to fill up/and/also/as well as/simultaneously
to record in writing/to carry (i.e. publish in a newspaper etc)/Taiwan pr. [zai4]/year
tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: It's an amphibious vehicle, which has a winch and a water cannon.
sentences.chinese: 它是一種水路兩棲載具，所以配備有絞盤和水炮。

sentences.english: The anti-tank rifleman is able to attack vehicles and destroy them with a light anti-armor weapon.
sentences.chinese: 反坦克兵可以使用輕型反坦克武器攻擊並摧毀載具。

sentences.english: The Raider Buggy is the 2nd fastest class of vehicle in the game.
sentences.chinese: 突擊車是遊戲裏第二快速的陸軍載具。

sentences.english: These artillery pieces resemble giant crossbows , on a simple wheeled carriage.
sentences.chinese: 這種攻城器實際上是一個裝在輪式載具上的大弩。

sentences.english: Commonly with vehicles or buildings, the lase will seem to 'snap to' the object.
sentences.chinese: 通常鐳射載具或建築，標記好像“貼齊”在目標上。

sentences.english: Carried by Crewmen, the Crewman Wrench is a much weaker version of the Engineer Wrench.
sentences.chinese: 載具乘員裝備中的扳手比工兵的要弱一些。

definition: tablet computer (iPad, Android devices etc)/CL:臺|台[tai2]
to drive/to propel/drive (vehicle wheel)/drive mechanism (tape or disk)/device driver (computing software)
